title: Weaving Arts of the North American Indian (Art Ebook).pdf
description:
Weaving Arts of the North American Indian
Thomas Y. Crowell | 1978 | ISBN: 0690017391 | English | 230 pages | PDF | 41.2 MB

Examines all aspects of textile artistry and techniques of the native peoples of North America, from prehistoric times to the present. First providing a historical review of Indian culture, the book then goes on to discuss looms, dyeing, weaving technology and aesthetics, and includes a chapter on the collection and preservation of these artifacts
